channel.title: [ PI ] Duel Arena Bug(s)?
channel.description:
How do I fix the glitch where when you win the duel at the duel arena, the other player lags and gets nulled and to fix the nulling you have to restart the server?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
How do I fix the duping glitch at the duel arena? I won the duel so my staked items went back to me, but the person who lost the duel got the items as well. Wtf?
Any help is awesome.
